subject: web_based test client using database
msgSnippet: i m trying to design a web based testing client using junit, where all results are stored in database. this client will be helpfull for mainly regrassion test.
messageBody:
i'm trying to design a web based testing client using junit, where
all results are stored in database. this client will be helpfull
for mainly regrassion test. can anybody give me some idea about
the structure of that database and how to incorporate the the
testresult, testsuit name, and testcases log in tha database ?? if
there is any example of such client plz. tell me .

Sudipto
